source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_SEQ_00<tab>Hirase is impressed by your industrious nature.
target: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_SEQ_00<tab>筋違砦のヒラセは、冒険者の活躍を見ていたようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_01<tab>Use the rotting fish to lure out aggressive sharks and slay them.
target: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA36801 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CAD01 /var>を使い<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F21A4201 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_030<tab>You've been busy, haven't you? And now you're here to ask if I need help with anything? Heh, now that you mention it...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_030<tab>お前、さっきからずいぶん活躍してるみたいだな。
腕も立つし、信頼できる働きぶり……
それを見込んで、俺からも依頼をさせてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_031<tab>Lately we've had trouble with ravenous sharks that've been leaping out of the water and making off with our fish. Damndest thing, I know, but you wouldn't doubt it if you saw it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_031<tab>頼みたいのは「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F21A4201 /var>」の駆除さ。
奴ら、俺たちがちょーっと目を離した隙に、
大事な食料である魚を、持っていっちまうんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_032<tab>We've got to cull the thieving bastards regularly─so happens I sent three of my mates out there before you came along. Still, the more the merrier. If you can kill two or so, that ought to be enough.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_032<tab>しかも、かなり獰猛でな……。
倒すのにも一苦労だから、手を貸してくれると助かる。
おびき寄せる餌として、そこの魚を使うといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_033<tab>Take a few of those rotting fish as bait. I'll not be needing them. Oh, and maybe see if you can't find the other group. They've been away longer than I like.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_033<tab>何匹か駆除したら、東の浜辺で同じ任務にあたっている、
うちの仲間に報告してくれ。
よろしく頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_035<tab>To be honest, I'm more worried about my mates than the sharks at this point. They should've come back by now...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_035<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F21A4201 /var>」の駆除にあたってる仲間は、2人……
片方は、いかにも生真面目そうな顔をしてやがるから、
終わったら探してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_050<tab>Oh, kami be praised! I don't know what I would've done if you hadn't come along.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_050<tab>あ、ああ……助かった……！
すみません、突然コウジン族に襲われて……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_051<tab>My partners and I got separated when we fled. You haven't seen them, have you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_051<tab>あの、オレのほかに、誰か助けませんでしたか！？
一緒にいた仲間が、先に連れていかれて……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_052<tab>Damn... Before the Kojin started chasing us, their leader asked us if we were Doman...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_052<tab>そう、ですか……。
さっきのコウジン族は、オレたちに出身を聞いたんです。
ドマだと答えたら、ヨツユ様の命令で連行すると……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_053<tab>They're Yotsuyu's catchers, I know it! First Isari, and now this! I've got to tell Rasho and the others!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_053<tab>クソッ、あの女、ドマ人を根絶やしにする気か……ッ！？
オレ、お頭に報告しに戻ります。
助けてくださって、本当にありがとうございました！

source:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_060<tab>We've been keeping busy. How about─
Oh no, you've got that look. What happened now?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_060<tab>あっ、そっちも終わった？
……って、深刻な顔だね、何かあったの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>Ah, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I heard you went shark hunting?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>ああ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
そちらもひと仕事してきたのかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>We too did our fair share of beast culling─though I think Lyse made a stronger impression when she bested a drunken pirate in a sparring match. Fastest knockout to date, I am told.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>こっちは、暴れまわってた海獣を討伐したわ。
リセは、喧嘩をふっかけてきた海賊衆の力自慢を、
華麗に吹っ飛ばしてみせたみたい。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>I should like to think we have proven ourselves to be rather─
Hm. Why do I get the feeling you have something important to tell me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>帝国と戦う力があると証明するには、
まだ足りないかもしれないけれど、まずは一目置かれ……
って、何かあったの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>Kojin mercenaries rounding up Doman Confederates? Surely Yotsuyu has crossed the line now...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>コウジン族が、ドマ出身の海賊衆を拐った……！？
あのヨツユって奴、どれだけドマ人を虐げたいのよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>We must go and speak with Rasho immediately. Even he cannot deny that this changes everything.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>私たちも、急いでラショウのところに向かいましょう。
そういう状況なら、彼もこちらの交渉に応じる…………

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>At least, I should like to think that he cannot...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>いえ、違うわね。
私たちと彼らで助けあえるかも、よ。
……行きましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_080<tab>What is Yotsuyu thinking, kidnapping Confederates? She has to know they won't take this lying down.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_080<tab>海賊衆は、帝国からの勧告に従ってたのに……
代理総督ヨツユ、何を考えてるの……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>We need to speak with Rasho immediately!
target: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>ラショウたちのところに行きましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TANSUI_000_090<tab>...Let's get this over with, shall we?
target: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TANSUI_000_090<tab>……ったく、やってくれたもんだ。
